claims.justification: The overwhelming consensus among climate scientists is that climate change is real and primarily caused by human activities.
Extensive studies have shown no link between vaccines and autism. This claim has been widely debunked by scientific research.

claims.text: Drinking water helps maintain healthy skin.
claims.justification: While hydration is essential for overall health, its direct impact on skin appearance varies and may not be as significant as claimed.

claims.text: Artificial Intelligence will replace all human jobs by 2050.
claims.justification: AI is expected to automate some tasks, but it is unlikely to replace all jobs due to the complexity of human creativity and emotional intelligence.

claims.text: The Great Wall of China is visible from space.
claims.justification: While some astronauts have claimed to see it, visibility is limited due to the wall's narrow width compared to its surroundings.

claims.text: Consuming sugar leads to hyperactivity in children.
claims.justification: Scientific studies have not found a direct link between sugar consumption and hyperactivity in children.
